title: How to become a writer for a standup comedian - Quora

response.answer_text: I dont call myself a writer, thats a person who not only writes but makes some kind of living at it. However I am buds with hundreds they all say the same thing to the question of how to be a writer?: Write But every day, pick a 2–4 hour time frame and write, like a job. Show up, write, got nothing? write anyway, no matter what. Write Want to be a writer? Start there. Cant or wont do that? Sell cars, your choice
